parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking and leaking of the fuel tank can cause fuel to spill onto the manifold, leading to a fire hazard, and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: inability to drive the vehicle due to fuel loss.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the heater core can cause hot steam to be released into the passenger compartment, potentially causing burns to occupants and creating a hazardous driving situation.
symptoms: Hot steam or coolant leaking into the passenger compartment
sudden loud noise or hissing sound from the heater core

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front A-Arm Failure due to Poor Welding
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front A-arm can cause loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries to occupants, as well as damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Unusual noises or vibrations from the front suspension
cracks or breaks in the A-arm.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower bearing of the steering column can cause hazardous steering, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering column bearing falls from the bearing race
creating a loose or wobbly steering wheel
making it difficult to steer the vehicle.
